meanings.sent1: The injured stray dog was considered unadoptable due to its aggressive behavior.
meanings.sent2: The shelter labeled the sick cat as unadoptable because of its contagious illness.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy parrot declared itself unadoptable and refused to socialize with potential owners.
meanings.sent4: The old, rusty car in the junkyard looked unadoptable, covered in vines and dust.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house at the end of the street had an unadoptable aura, with broken windows and overgrown weeds.

meanings.sent1: The feral kitten was unadoptable as it refused to interact with humans.
meanings.sent2: The wild rabbit, being unadoptable, found solace in the freedom of the forest.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn donkey jokingly claimed to be unadoptable, preferring to roam the fields independently.
meanings.sent4: The rare flower, hidden deep in the forest, seemed unadoptable by any gardener's hand.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact, with its mysterious symbols, appeared unadoptable by modern scholars.
